text:
I'm working on HubSpot Quote Theme

*Is there a way to access to PREVIEW QUOTE and see the CSS changes in LIVE ? (like website page)*

It's really painfull to update the entire page when working on Template Design
I tried a workaround by directly accessing to iframe but there is internal server error

Moreover if I publish the quote , the template is locked ...

Thanks for your help !
I mean the system page for Managing Subscriptions in teh systems subdirectory for templates in the HubSpot theme structure. Maybe I wasn't clear on this.
You can use preview option from the template url, but it will not work in staging according to my knowledge. <@U02BEP236MA>
Yeah, that is what I am thinking.

Have you tried previewing the template in design manager? It uses placeholder data but good for css testing. I also create a quote and use the iframe preview. Change text in notes to buyer to refresh iframe.
Thank you for your help <@U03UY195LKD> , btw! I really appreciate it.
